entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a witch and one of Voldemort's followers. She is described as screaming and sending spells streaming off her chest.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist, described as vanishing and reappearing beside the pool.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a wise and powerful wizard who advances on Voldemort. He is calm and speaks to Voldemort.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being thrust back by the headless statue.

entities.name: the aurors
entities.description: The Aurors are a group of wizards and witches who are on their way to stop Voldemort.

entities.name: the goblin
entities.description: The goblin is mentioned as scuttling towards the fireplaces.

entities.name: the house-elf
entities.description: The house-elf is mentioned as scuttling towards the fireplaces with the goblin.

entities.name: the golden centaur
entities.description: The golden centaur is described as cantering around Dumbledore and Voldemort.

entities.name: the one-armed centaur
entities.description: The one-armed centaur is mentioned as galloping at Voldemort.

entities.name: the headless statue
entities.description: The headless statue is described as thrusting Harry back ward.

entities.name: tom
entities.description: Tom is Voldemort's name, mentioned by Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Voldemort sent a Killing Curse at Bellatrix.
The Aurors are on their way to stop Voldemort.
Dumbledore addressed Tom (Voldemort) saying it was foolish to come here tonight.
Voldemort's Killing Curse hit the security guards' desk instead of Dumbledore.
Dumbledore cast a spell on Voldemort.
